ratings.question_text: Your level of engagement with the course was:
What is your overall assessment of this course?
The course was well organized to facilitate student learning.
I received clear feedback that improved my learning.
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the level of intellectual challenge of this course was:
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the workload of this course was:

narratives.question_text: What knowledge, skills, and insights did you develop by taking this course?
comments: I learned how to synthesize a metric ton of information and write a thesis.
Absolutely excellent course. I love how the evst major guides you along the senior thesis process. I felt supported the entire time and the regular assignments helped me stay on track.
this course was really helpful for writing my senior thesis this semester!

narratives.question_text: What are the strengths and weaknesses of this course and how could it be improved?
comments: The EVST colloquium is really cool. I love being in a smaller group of students that I can write alongside and commiserate with lol.
Weekly assignments was super helpful. Meeting for an hour or more weekly was quite unnecessary. 1/2 hour would have totally been sufficient.
No weaknesses! I loved meeting as a group and individually with my mentor. Honestly, I had a fantastic time throughout!

i think the assignments are really helpful for ushering us along the process of writing the thesis. Things pick up really fast, so the course might benefit from assigning more work/writing sooner in the semester so the draft isn't as sudden

This class was not very helpful for me. Rather, it felt like a lot of busy work and two-hour long meetings that were not useful or productive. It's good to have a small cohort to work with, but would've been more useful for me if it was designed more as a dedicated work time with the potential to ask questions, rather than how it is right now.

narratives.question_text: Would you recommend this course to another student? Please explain.
comments: You're taking this because you have to, but EVST does a good job of helping to minimize the pain of writing a thesis.
I think you have to take it to do the EVST thesis, so yes
Well....EVST students have to take it.
